body:
Comment 3: 
The remaining part (lost documentation comments) appears to have been introduced 
with the semicolon change and is related to - of all places - the changes in go/scanner. 
The introduced semicolons are on the wrong line which causes the go/parser not to 
recognize lead comments which in turn don't show up in the ast, the doc, and 
eventually godoc.
_Status changed to **Started**._
